section.title: Configuration Guide
section.paragraph: The static configuration for nova lives in two main files: nova.conf and policy.json. These are described below. For a bigger picture view on configuring nova to solve specific problems, refer to the Nova Admin Guide.

list_item.paragraph: Configuration Guide: Detailed configuration guides for various parts of you Nova system. Helpful reference for setting up specific hypervisor backends.
Config Reference: A complete reference of all configuration options available in the nova.conf file.
Sample Config File: A sample config file with inline documentation.

section.title: Policy
section.paragraph: Nova, like most OpenStack projects, uses a policy language to restrict permissions on REST API actions.

list_item.paragraph: Policy Reference: A complete reference of all policy points in nova and what they impact.
Sample Policy File: A sample policy file with inline documentation.
